title: 28 Steamy Sex Games For Very Playful Nights
text: If you end up in bed before you finish the game, don't worry. In that case, everyone's a winner. Click through to browse some of the steamiest sex games available. Lovehoney Foreplay in a Row, $19, available at Lovehoney . Courtesy of Lovehoney This adults-only twist on Connect Four has players challenging each other to different foreplay activities, all while trying to get four pieces in a row. Adam and Eve Oral Sex Game, $12.95, available at Adam and Eve . Courtesy of Adam & Eve You and your partner tease and tempt each other around the board until one of you wins the grand prize, which is — you guessed it — oral sex. Trystology In The Mood For Love Game, $14, available at Trystology . Courtesy of Trystology This set boasts — count 'em — 105 exciting and "moody" seduction suggestion cards. This is one game that will keep you busy. For the full list head to Refinery29.com . Now, watch "Smell My Neck: The Blind Date Test" below: #
